name: RecognizeGod'sVoice
0:
”Alexa, open Am I Hearing God”
”Alexa, start Am I Hearing God”
”Alexa, launch Am I Hearing God”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: am i hearing god
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Share a time you sensed God speaking to you. What did he say? How did you know it was God? 

How can you discern it is God speaking rather than your own desires or even the Devil? 

● James 3:14–15: But if you harbor bitter envy and selfish ambition in your hearts, do not boast about it or deny the truth. Such “wisdom” does not come down from heaven but is earthly, unspiritual, demonic.

Verse 14, indicate two barriers for knowing God’s will. 
Verse 17 are confirmation of God’s will.

We make bad decisions when we compare (“bitter envy”) ourselves to others rather than God. We make bad decisions when we are selfish rather than sacrificial. How have you seen this principle in practice in your own life or those you love?

● James 3:17: But the wisdom that comes from heaven is first of all pure; then peace-loving, considerate, submissive, full of mercy and good fruit, impartial and sincere.
How could you use James 3:14-17 as a test for assessing a “word
from the Lord”?
And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight, so that you may be able to discern what is best and may be pure and blameless for the day of Christ, filled with the fruit of righteousness that comes through Jesus Christ—to the glory and praise of God. (Philippians 1:9–11)
priv:
